title: MINIATURE daffodils and muscari in a mosaic pot
description: Add a touch of elegance to your dollhouse with these meticulously handcrafted 1:12 scale miniature spring flowers. Each flower and leaf is made and painted by me by hand. The ceramic pot is decorated with mosaic. This miniature is unique and cannot be repeated. All elements are glued. Perfect for collectors, dollhouse decoration, dioramas, fairy gardens, and creative photo styling. This set will bring a touch of life and color to any miniature scene. Not suitable for childreâ€¦
